00044 TableMutator::TableMutator(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, Comm *comm, TableIdentifier *table_identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr, RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator_ptr, int timeout) : m_props_ptr(props_ptr), m_comm(comm), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr), m_range_locator_ptr(range_locator_ptr), m_table_identifier(table_identifier), m_memory_used(0), m_max_memory(DEFAULT_MAX_MEMORY), m_resends(0), m_timeout(timeout), m_last_error(Error::OK), m_last_op(0) {
00045 
00046   if (m_timeout == 0 ||
00047       (m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Client.Timeout", 0)) == 0 ||
00048       (m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Request.Timeout", 0)) == 0)
00049     m_timeout = HYPERTABLE_CLIENT_TIMEOUT;
00050 
00051   m_buffer_ptr = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table_identifier, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr);
00052 }

00058 void TableMutator::set(uint64_t timestamp, KeySpec &key, const void *value, uint32_t value_len) {
00059   Timer timer(m_timeout);
00060 
00061   if (m_last_error != Error::OK)
00062     m_last_error = Error::OK;
00063 
00064   try {
00065 
00066     m_last_op = SET;
00067 
00068     sanity_check_key(key);
00069 
00070     if (key.column_family == 0)
00071       throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid key - column family not specified");
00072 
00073     {
00074       Key full_key;
00075       Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family);
00076       if (cf == 0)
00077         throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY, (std::string)"Invalid key - bad column family '" + key.column_family + "'");
00078       full_key.row = (const char *)key.row;
00079       full_key.column_qualifier = (const char *)key.column_qualifier;
00080       full_key.column_family_code = (uint8_t)cf->id;
00081       full_key.timestamp = timestamp;
00082     
00083       m_buffer_ptr->set(full_key, value, value_len, timer);
00084     }
00085 
00086     m_memory_used += 20 + key.row_len + key.column_qualifier_len + value_len;
00087 
00088     m_last_op = FLUSH;
00089 
00090     if (m_buffer_ptr->full() || m_memory_used > m_max_memory) {
00091 
00092       timer.start();
00093 
00094       if (m_prev_buffer_ptr)
00095         wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00096 
00097       m_buffer_ptr->send();
00098 
00099       m_prev_buffer_ptr = m_buffer_ptr;
00100 
00101       m_buffer_ptr = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(m_props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table_identifier, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr);
00102       m_memory_used = 0;
00103     }
00104 
00105   }
00106   catch (Exception &e) {
00107     m_last_error = e.code();
00108     memcpy(&m_last_timestamp, &timestamp, sizeof(timestamp));
00109     memcpy(&m_last_key, &key, sizeof(key));
00110     m_last_value = value;
00111     m_last_value_len = value_len;
00112     throw;
00113   }
00114 
00115 }

00119 void TableMutator::set_delete(uint64_t timestamp, KeySpec &key) {
00120   Key full_key;
00121   Timer timer(m_timeout);
00122 
00123   if (m_last_error != Error::OK)
00124     m_last_error = Error::OK;
00125 
00126   try {
00127 
00128     m_last_op = SET_DELETE;
00129 
00130     sanity_check_key(key);
00131 
00132     if (key.column_family == 0) {
00133       full_key.row = (const char *)key.row;
00134       full_key.column_family_code = 0;
00135       full_key.column_qualifier = 0;
00136       full_key.timestamp = timestamp;    
00137     }
00138     else  {
00139       Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family);
00140       if (cf == 0)
00141         throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY, (std::string)"Invalid key - bad column family '" + key.column_family + "'");
00142       full_key.row = (const char *)key.row;
00143       full_key.column_qualifier = (const char *)key.column_qualifier;
00144       full_key.column_family_code = (uint8_t)cf->id;
00145       full_key.timestamp = timestamp;
00146     }
00147 
00148     m_buffer_ptr->set_delete(full_key, timer);
00149 
00150     m_memory_used += 20 + key.row_len + key.column_qualifier_len;
00151 
00152     m_last_op = FLUSH;
00153 
00154     if (m_buffer_ptr->full() || m_memory_used > m_max_memory) {
00155 
00156       timer.start();
00157 
00158       if (m_prev_buffer_ptr)
00159         wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00160 
00161       m_buffer_ptr->send();
00162 
00163       m_prev_buffer_ptr = m_buffer_ptr;
00164 
00165       m_buffer_ptr = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(m_props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table_identifier, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr);
00166       m_memory_used = 0;
00167     }
00168   }
00169   catch (Exception &e) {
00170     m_last_error = e.code();
00171     memcpy(&m_last_timestamp, &timestamp, sizeof(timestamp));
00172     memcpy(&m_last_key, &key, sizeof(key));
00173     throw;
00174   }
00175 
00176 }

00178 
00179 void TableMutator::flush() {
00180   Timer timer(m_timeout, true);
00181 
00182   if (m_last_error != Error::OK)
00183     m_last_error = Error::OK;
00184 
00185   try {
00186 
00187     if (m_prev_buffer_ptr)
00188       wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00189 
00193     if (m_memory_used > 0) {
00194       m_buffer_ptr->send();
00195       m_prev_buffer_ptr = m_buffer_ptr;
00196       wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00197     }
00198 
00199     m_buffer_ptr->reset();
00200     m_prev_buffer_ptr = 0;
00201 
00202   }
00203   catch (Exception &e) {
00204     m_last_error = e.code();
00205     m_last_op = FLUSH;
00206     throw;
00207   }
00208 
00209 }

00212 bool TableMutator::retry(int timeout) {
00213   int save_timeout = m_timeout;
00214 
00215   if (m_last_error == Error::OK)
00216     return true;
00217 
00218   try {
00219     if (timeout != 0)
00220       m_timeout = timeout;
00221 
00222     if (m_last_op == SET)
00223       set(m_last_timestamp, m_last_key, m_last_value, m_last_value_len);
00224     else if (m_last_op == SET_DELETE)
00225       set_delete(m_last_timestamp, m_last_key);
00226     if (m_last_op == FLUSH)
00227       flush();
00228   }
00229   catch(Exception &e) {
00230     m_timeout = save_timeout;
00231     return false;
00232   }
00233   m_timeout = save_timeout;
00234   return true;
00235 }

00238 
00239 void TableMutator::wait_for_previous_buffer(Timer &timer) {
00240   TableMutatorScatterBuffer *redo_buffer = 0;
00241   int wait_time = 1;
00242 
00243   while (!m_prev_buffer_ptr->wait_for_completion(timer)) {
00244 
00245     if (timer.remaining() < wait_time)
00246       throw Exception(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT);
00247 
00248     // wait a bit
00249     poll(0, 0, wait_time*1000);
00250     wait_time += 2;
00251 
00255     if ((redo_buffer = m_prev_buffer_ptr->create_redo_buffer(timer)) == 0)
00256       continue;
00257 
00258     m_resends += m_prev_buffer_ptr->get_resend_count();
00259 
00260     m_prev_buffer_ptr = redo_buffer;
00261 
00265     m_prev_buffer_ptr->send();
00266   }
00267 
00268 }

00272 void TableMutator::sanity_check_key(KeySpec &key) {
00273   const char *row = (const char *)key.row;
00274   const char *column_qualifier = (const char *)key.column_qualifier;
00275 
00279   if (key.row_len == 0)
00280     throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid row key - cannot be zero length");
00281 
00282   if (row[key.row_len] != 0)
00283     throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid row key - must be followed by a '\\0' character");
00284 
00285   if (strlen(row) != key.row_len)
00286     throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY, (std::string)"Invalid row key - '\\0' character not allowed (offset=" + (uint32_t)strlen(row) + ")");
00287 
00288   if (row[0] == (char)0xff && row[1] == (char)0xff)
00289     throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid row key - cannot start with character sequence 0xff 0xff");
00290 
00294   if (key.column_qualifier_len > 0) {
00295     if (column_qualifier[key.column_qualifier_len] != 0)
00296       throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid column qualifier - must be followed by a '\\0' character");
00297     if (strlen(column_qualifier) != key.column_qualifier_len)
00298       throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY, (std::string)"Invalid column qualifier - '\\0' character not allowed (offset=" + (uint32_t)strlen(column_qualifier) + ")");
00299   }
00300 }
